mergeResults.content: Identity: 40-year-old former headman of Lisle; skilled rider with possible military background; stoic, pragmatic, stubborn to the point of self-destruction. State: Newly awakened immensely powerful Mage-Gift (unknown type, possibly Firestarting)—burned open mental channels cause white-hot agony, blurred vision, teetering sanity; Gift-shock severe; physically exhausted but forcing himself through sheer willpower. Arc: Witnessed entire village destroyed and people carried off during bandit attack; believes others caused destruction—doesn't yet fully accept he did it himself; driven by duty to warn Haven despite trauma; initially dismissed Senta as 'insufferable horse,' called her for mercy killing. Relationship with Senta: Chosen by her—bond snapped into place when their eyes locked; her unconditional love and mental bridges stabilized his fracturing mind enough to survive; accepts bond pragmatically ('I'm in no position to argue') but resists her care ('If you tire, I'll drag you'); their connection allows mind-speech though it pains his ragged channels. Evidence gathered: Red robes hidden under bandit clothing; suspects organized sect, not simple bandits; tracks lead toward Menmellith.

Identity: 40-year-old former headman of Lisle; skilled rider with possible military background; stoic, pragmatic, stubborn to the point of self-destruction; from border region—knows Karsite features and tactics.
State: Newly awakened immensely powerful Mage-Gift (unknown type, possibly Firestarting)—burned open mental channels cause white-hot agony, blurred vision, teetering sanity; Gift-shock severe, caused four-day unconsciousness during journey; now at Haven Healers' Collegium, unconscious but stable; memories of Lisle destruction blocked/suppressed.
Arc: Witnessed entire village destroyed and people carried off during bandit attack; believes others caused destruction—doesn't yet fully accept he did it himself; driven by duty to warn Haven despite trauma; initially dismissed Senta as 'insufferable horse,' called her for mercy killing → accepted Companion bond, shifted to partnership ('we face it together'); ordered Senta to knock him out if he loses control—accepts danger he poses.
Stance: [Senta] Chosen by her—bond snapped into place when their eyes locked; her unconditional love and mental bridges stabilized his fracturing mind enough to survive; accepts bond pragmatically but resists excessive care; their connection allows mind-speech though it pains his ragged channels; affectionate partnership ('we face it together').
Evidence gathered: Red robes hidden under bandit clothing; suspects organized sect, not simple bandits; tracks lead toward Menmellith; theories captives meant for blood magic ritual sacrifice (old Karsite practice).

Identity: 40-year-old former headman of Lisle; skilled rider with possible military background; stoic, pragmatic, stubborn to the point of self-destruction; from border region—knows Karsite features and tactics, instinctive distrust from decades fighting border raids.
State: Newly awakened immensely powerful Mage-Gift (confirmed to Circle, power capable of leveling villages, not seen since Vanyel's era)—burned open mental channels cause white-hot agony, blurred vision; Gift-shock severe, caused four-day unconsciousness; now at Haven Healers' Collegium, assigned Healer's cottage for containment; stable but dangerous; memories of Lisle destruction blocked/suppressed; untrained Mindspeech.
Arc: Witnessed entire village destroyed and people carried off during bandit attack; believes others caused destruction—doesn't yet fully accept he did it himself; driven by duty to warn Haven despite trauma; initially dismissed Senta as 'insufferable horse,' called her for mercy killing → accepted Companion bond, shifted to partnership ('we face it together'); ordered Senta to knock him out if he loses control—accepts danger he poses; complete mind-merge with Talia gave him all her memories, training, state secrets, intimate knowledge—can use her shielding techniques and protocol, occasionally slips into her mannerisms/authority; stabilized Talia's mental collapse through direct contact, closed connection via kiss; taking on strategic leadership role using combined knowledge.
Stance: [Senta] Chosen by her—bond snapped into place when their eyes locked; her unconditional love and mental bridges stabilized his fracturing mind enough to survive; accepts bond pragmatically but resists excessive care; their connection allows mind-speech though it pains his ragged channels; affectionate partnership ('we face it together').
Stance: [Talia] Complete mind-merge—carries all her memories, training, state secrets, intimate knowledge; can use her techniques; stabilized her mental collapse through forced Mindspeech contact, closed connection via kiss.
Stance: [Alberich] Assessed his loyalty pragmatically despite instinctive distrust of Karsites.
Evidence gathered: Red robes hidden under bandit clothing; suspects organized sect, not simple bandits; tracks lead toward Menmellith; theories captives meant for blood magic ritual sacrifice (old Karsite practice).

finalContent:
Identity: 40-year-old former headman of Lisle; skilled rider with possible military background; stoic, pragmatic, stubborn to the point of self-destruction; from border region—knows Karsite features and tactics, instinctive distrust from decades fighting border raids.
State: Newly awakened immensely powerful Mage-Gift (confirmed to Circle, power capable of leveling villages, not seen since Vanyel's era)—burned open mental channels cause white-hot agony, blurred vision; Gift-shock severe, caused four-day unconsciousness; now at Haven Healers' Collegium, assigned Healer's cottage for containment; stable but dangerous; memories of Lisle destruction blocked/suppressed; untrained Mindspeech.
Arc: Witnessed entire village destroyed and people carried off during bandit attack; believes others caused destruction—doesn't yet fully accept he did it himself; driven by duty to warn Haven despite trauma; initially dismissed Senta as 'insufferable horse,' called her for mercy killing → accepted Companion bond, shifted to partnership ('we face it together'); ordered Senta to knock him out if he loses control—accepts danger he poses; complete mind-merge with Talia gave him all her memories, training, state secrets, intimate knowledge—can use her shielding techniques and protocol, occasionally slips into her mannerisms/authority; stabilized Talia's mental collapse through direct contact, closed connection via kiss; taking on strategic leadership role using combined knowledge.
Stance: [Senta] Chosen by her—bond snapped into place when their eyes locked; her unconditional love and mental bridges stabilized his fracturing mind enough to survive; accepts bond pragmatically but resists excessive care; their connection allows mind-speech though it pains his ragged channels; affectionate partnership ('we face it together').
Stance: [Talia] Complete mind-merge—carries all her memories, training, state secrets, intimate knowledge; can use her techniques; stabilized her mental collapse through forced Mindspeech contact, closed connection via kiss.
Stance: [Alberich] Assessed his loyalty pragmatically despite instinctive distrust of Karsites.
Evidence gathered: Red robes hidden under bandit clothing; suspects organized sect, not simple bandits; tracks lead toward Menmellith; theories captives meant for blood magic ritual sacrifice (old Karsite practice).
